entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 10:47 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:47 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
